ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is nothing but Revelation revealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is nothing but a revelation that is conveyed to him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is a revelations which has been revealed to him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is but a divine revelation, which is revealed to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is only a revelation revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It is naught but revelation that is revealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is naught but a revelation revealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is naught save an inspiration that is inspired,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It [the Quran] is nothing but revelation sent down to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is but a revelation revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: it is just a revelation that is revealed [to him],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is no less than inspiration sent down to him:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is only an Inspiration that is inspired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed it is not except a Revelation which is revealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is but a revelation revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is not but a revelation revealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:4] It is but a revelation that is revealed, to him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is) i.e. the Qur'an (naught save an inspiration) from Allah (that is inspired) to him through Gabriel who comes and recites it to him,
